name: Christmas Rings: Free game
description:
Bubble rings are back! Enjoy Christmas spirit with a holiday edition of classic Bubble ring toss game - Christmas rings!

Back in the day, some of us had this old toy with color rings floating in water, that we all tried to get on the hook with bubbles coming out of pipes and rings dash in all directions on the sea background.

And now you can play it right on your phone! It’s endless fun, everywhere – at home, on the trip, in transport or under Christmas tree while you wait for Santa to bring you presents and gifts!

Tap on the buttons to throw cute candy rings at lollipop sticks, and try to keep ‘em all from falling down!

There is no countdown or score system – for us every player is a winner!

If you want to find exciting game for children on this long weekend, or have some fun while in transport, Christmas rings are a perfect match for you!

Also, switch to Camera mode and bring joy to your home, school and office!

Gather your family, friends and neighbors to share this game together!

Key features:

  • Colours, festive rings

  • Realistic physics!

  • Simple interface - there are only two controls!

  • Infinite fun - no limits, timers or countdowns!

  • Game for all ages - virtually anyone can play Christmas rings!

  • Holiday atmosphere of Carols and Snow-covered hills!

  • Camera mode for great experience!

Enjoy our first Bubble Ring game, and be sure to share your opinion with us!
